products.name: Daily Conditioner
products.ingredients_raw: water, aloe barbadensis leaf extract, glycerin, cetyl alcohol, stearyl alcohol, cetrimonium chloride, behentrimonium chloride, olea europaea olive fruit oil, glycereth-26, butyrospermum parkii shea butter, hydroxypropyltrimonium honey, hypnea musciformis extract seaweed, gelidiella acerosa extract seaweed, sargassum filipendula extract seaweed, sorbitol, silk amino acids, rosmarinus officinalis rosemary leaf extract, chamomilla recutita matricaria flower extract, urtica dioica nettle extract, simmondsia chinensis jojoba seed oil, tocopheryl acetate vitamin e, panthenol vitamin b5, arnica montana flower extract, hydroxyethylcellulose, phenoxyethanol, sorbic acid, ethylhexylglycerin, citric acid, sodium phytate, fragrance
